member.name: T:RockPaperScissorsPro.Moves
member.summary: Encapsulates move semantics for Rock, Paper, Azure

member.name: M:RockPaperScissorsPro.Moves.GetRandomMove
member.summary: Gets a random move of either rock, paper, or scissors.
member.returns: A move of rock, paper, or scissors.

member.name: M:RockPaperScissorsPro.Moves.GetRandomNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a random number between 0 and max (exclusive).
member.param: The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated; must be greater than zero

member.name: M:RockPaperScissorsPro.Move.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if two moves are equivalent

member.summary: Determines if two moves are equivalent

member.summary: Determines if two moves are different

member.name: M:RockPaperScissorsPro.Move.GetHashCode
member.summary: Provides unique hash code for a move

member.name: T:RockPaperScissorsPro.GameRules
member.summary: Collection of rules defining a Rock, Paper, Azure match

member.name: F:RockPaperScissorsPro.GameRules.Default
member.summary: Default Rock, Paper, Azure match rules

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.GameRules.MaximumGames
member.summary: Maximum number of games that will be played between two opponents in a given match (value: 5000)

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.GameRules.PointsToWin
member.summary: Number of points needed to win a match (value: 1000)

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.GameRules.StartingDynamite
member.summary: Number of dynamite moves that can be made in a given match (value: 100)

member.name: T:RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer
member.summary: Interface representing a player (bot) in Rock, Paper, Azure

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer.TeamName
member.summary: Player's (bot's) name (inferred from bot assembly name)

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer.DynamiteRemaining
member.summary: Number of valid dynamite moves player has remaining in match

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer.HasDynamite
member.summary: Indicates whether player can use dynamite on next move

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer.Points
member.summary: Number of points player has accrued in current match

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer.NumberOfDecisions
member.summary: Number of completed moves player has made in current match

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer.TotalTimeDeciding
member.summary: Total execution time consumed by player's bot in current match

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer.LastMove
member.summary: Player's previous move

member.name: P:RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer.Log
member.summary: Log file

member.name: T:RockPaperScissorsPro.IRockPaperScissorsBot
member.summary: Interface that must be implemented by every Rock, Paper, Azure bot

member.name: M:RockPaperScissorsPro.IRockPaperScissorsBot.MakeMove(RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer,RockPaperScissorsPro.IPlayer,RockPaperScissorsPro.GameRules)
member.summary: Implementation of a single move in Rock, Paper, Azure
member.param: Status information about your bot in the current match
Status information about your bot's opponent in the current match

member.name: T:RockPaperScissorsPro.ExceptionMove
member.summary: Uninstantiatable type used to indicate a move that caused an exception or timeout
